| --- | --- | --- |
| Mexico | Jalisco | Yes, Mexico contains Jalisco |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Jalisco | - | - |

The table above shows the hierarchical relationship between the two locations mentioned in the paragraph. Mexico is the broader location that encompasses Jalisco, which is the more specific location. Therefore, the relationship between Mexico and Jalisco is that Mexico contains Jalisco.

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.
